name: Infiltrator
description: The Infiltrator is a Medium humanoid known for its stealth and adaptability, equipped with studded leather armor, wielding shortswords and a dagger, with a keen sense of charm.
memorable: Possesses the unique Knowledge Charm, granting proficiency in skills and additional languages for tactical advantages.
goals: Engage in operations requiring stealth and manipulation; often employed in subterfuge.
relations: May serve or be associated with organizations focused on espionage or subterfuge.
environment: Often found in urban areas where stealth and charm are advantageous.
strengths: High intelligence and charisma enhance its spellcasting and tactical social interactions.
weaknesses: Average physical strength limits its combat effectiveness compared to brawny foes.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with two shortsword strikes and a dagger thrust; can also engage at range with a light crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: Invisibility, allowing it to evade detection for tactical repositioning or ambush.
senses: Possesses passive Perception 14, reflecting its above-average perceptiveness.
skills: Has proficiency in perception and can gain proficiency in additional skills through its Knowledge Charm.
additional_information: Can cast spells like charm person and sleep to control encounters.
Employs Cunning Action to reposition quickly during combat.
Excels in social interactions thanks to high charisma and charm abilities.
Focuses on versatility in combat with spells and melee attacks.
Relies on stealth and adaptability for survival and success.
spellcasting: Can cast minor illusion, mage hand, and message at will, with charm person and sleep three times per day, and invisibility once per day.
